attributes.additional_details: A couple of staff are telling you to get skirts friom the nurse for being too short. Even if only 10cm above the knee. This subjects us to bullying and teasing, lowers our self esteem and we only to do it so we don't look stupid.  Its been taken completely out of hand and we are being given detentions - even the ones who are way below mid thigh length. So SIGN TO RAISE SKIRTS 2-3 INCHES ABOVE KNEE. (Mid thigh-ish because above is just too much... )
